column6: "DEATH TO THE BULLIES" M.O.D.O.K. down. Something is up. Trust M.O.D.O.K. Most explosions you have ever seen in a Marvel comic! Maybe. We're not entirely sure. But we do have an explosion-o-meter. SECRET AVENGERS ASSEMBLE!
column8: | writer:Ales Kot | penciller (cover):Tradd Moore | artist:Michael Walsh
